reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major rectal conditions: rectal cancer (~5-8 per 100k), inflammatory bowel disease with rectal involvement (~30-50 per 100k), hemorrhoids (~1000 per 100k), rectal polyps (~500 per 100k), diverticular disease (~300 per 100k), anal fissures (~200 per 100k), fecal incontinence (~600 per 100k) = ~5000 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity and significant overlap between categories.
